messages.title: JEREMY CORBYN TO HIT HALF OF FAMILY HOMES IN LONDON WITH TAX RISES
messages.content: 'HALF OF THE CAPITAL'S HOMES WOULD PAY MORE' - London Evening Standard, 3 May 2017

messages.title: CORBYN'S FAMILY HOMES TAX
messages.content:
1. Currently couples can pass on their home to their children or grandchildren tax-free if it's worth £850k or less.
 2. But Jeremy Corbyn wants to reduce that to £425k, hitting half of the homes in the capital with 40% inheritance tax. 'HALF OF THE CAPITAL'S HOMES WOULD PAY MORE' - London Evening Standard, 3 May 2017

messages.title: Think Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister is never going to happen?
messages.content:
DON'T BE SO SURE! - SHOCK TRUMP WIN:
 1. PRESIDENT TRUMP - STUNNING TRUMP WIN
 2. UK VOTES BREXIT - BREXIT: EUROPE STUNNED BY UK LEAVE VOTE
 3. JEREMY CORBYN VOTED LABOUR LEADER - SHOCK WIN: CORBYN WAS 200-1 OUTSIDER

housing.content: Currently couples can pass on their home to their children or grandchildren tax-free if it's worth £850k or less. But Jeremy Corbyn wants to reduce that to £425k, hitting half of the homes in the capital with 40% inheritance tax.

quotes.text: 'HALF OF THE CAPITAL'S HOMES WOULD PAY MORE'

images.caption: JEREMY CORBYN TO HIT HALF OF FAMILY HOMES IN LONDON WITH TAX RISES

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet appears to be from an opposing party's campaign focusing on criticism of Jeremy Corbyn's policy, rather than promoting a candidate or specific policies.
